mdRecord.dcterms:title: The New Testament of the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The New Testament of the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ translated out of the original Greek; and with the former translations diligently compared and revised. Northampton: Published by J.H. Butler The bible is inscribed "Yo Ellen from Ann on the end piece. There are hand written notes on the back cover and pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bible stories
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
